name: CORRECTIONAL LEADERS ASSOCIATION
description: To promote, support, and advance the profession of corrections
sampleDescriptions: Policy related to corrections, including the Cellphone Jamming Reform Act of 2025 (H.R.2350/S.1137) and the Second Chance Reauthorization Act of 2024 (H.R.8028/S.4477).
